astro-react-patterns.description: Patrones Astro 5 + React 19 para klay+ web: estructura del proyecto, dual runtime (server/browser), service layer, hooks, component organization y convenciones.

tailwind-design-system.description: Design system de klay+ web: tokens Tailwind (colores, tipografia, spacing), component classes en global.css, patrones de estilo y convenciones para componentes shared.

frontend-architecture.description: Arquitectura general del frontend: layers, dependencias, feature-based organization, state management, error handling, code splitting y la relacion Astro-React-Core.
